laboratory_examinations.findings: Identification of a nonsense mutation in the SHH gene (GAG to TAG) leading to Glu256stop.
Normal results for peripheral-blood lymphocytes from parents and affected child.

laboratory_examinations.date: First cycle: Not specified; Second cycle: Not specified
laboratory_examinations.findings: First cycle identified 12 embryos with 8 suitable for analysis; 7 contained mutant allele, 1 was mutation-free. Second cycle analyzed 10 embryos; 9 had data available, 8 were mutation-free.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: First cycle yielded no clinical pregnancy; the second cycle resulted in the birth of a mutation-free girl.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Confirmed mutation-free status of the fetus born after the second preimplantation genetic diagnosis cycle.
